original_title: 毎晩セックスの声が大きいお隣さんは夫の留守中、欲求不満で僕を誘惑。汗だくになって一週間ヤリまくった。  三宮つばき
overview: Before I turned 30, I was seconded to the Tokyo branch office. My friends were envious of me, but since I was so comfortable at my parents' house, I was fed up with it as soon as I moved. Furthermore, an AV-like gasping voice that can be heard leaking from the next room all night long. I hadn't been able to sleep at all, and when I left the house in the morning, I ran into a man who had just come out from next door. When I called out to pay attention, a beautiful woman came out of the room. …… The owner of the gasping voice I thought was AV was the young wife next door.
title: My Neighbor Who Has A Loud Sex Every Night Seduces Me With Frustration While Her Husband Is Away. I got sweaty and fucked for a week.
